component.name: CQRLOG
component.summary: An advanced registration program for radio amateurs based on the MySQL database

description.p: CQRLOG is an advanced logging program for radio amateurs based on the MySQL database. It provides radio control based on hamlib libraries (currently supports more than 140 radio types and models), connection to the DX cluster, QRZ callbook (web version), a grayliner, QSL database manager, etc.
